text: Brims is a village at the southern point of the island of Hoy, in Orkney, Scotland. The settlement is within the parish of Walls and Flotta. The RNLI lifeboat Thomas McCunn is on display at the Longhope Lifeboat Museum in Brims. ==References== ==External links== *Longhope Lifeboat Museum Trust *SSE - Brims Tidal Array *Canmore - Hoy, Chapel of Brims *Canmore - Hoy, Brims, The Skeo Broch Category:Villages in Orkney Category:Hoy
title: Brims
